contexts.context: ...Saxony. Has already paid 110,000 guilders. Debts <mark>incurred</mark> by Maximilian I. 9. Hopes the armorer has arrived...
...Urgently needs the 200,000 ducats. 4. The debt <mark>incurred</mark> by K's commissioners. 5. K's commissioners to clear...
...not as a dowry but as compensation for losses <mark>incurred</mark> in the treaty with Venice. 14. Difficulties satisfying...
